titleStmt.title: A true and perfect relation of the happy successe & victory obtained against the Turks of Argiers at Bugia, by His Majesties Fleet in the Mediterranean, under the command of Sr. Edw. Spragge as it is contained in a letter from the said Admiral, of the 11th of May, 1671 : together with an exact list of the Turks ships, burnt and destroyed, with the names of their commanders : as also, one other containing the names of such as were slain or wounded on the part of the English in this memorable action.
titleStmt.author: Spragge, Edward, Sir, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Identified at reel 515:1 as Wing S5027 and at reel 2318:29 as Wing T2558 (identical items).
Reproductions of original in Bodleian Library.
